effect.minecraft.instant_health.desc: Heals living entities and damages undead.
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.desc: Damages living entities and heals undead.
effect.minecraft.jump_boost.desc: Increases jump height and decreases fall damage.
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.desc: Grants immunity to fire and lava.
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.desc: Grants the ability to breathe underwater.
effect.minecraft.blindness.desc: Decreases viewing range and prevents the player from sprinting and dealing critical hits.
effect.minecraft.poison.desc: Deals damage over time, but doesn't kill.
effect.minecraft.glowing.desc: Outlines entities, making them visible through blocks.
effect.minecraft.luck.desc: Increases the quality and quantity of loot.
effect.minecraft.unluck.desc: Decreases the quality and quantity of loot.
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.desc: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage.
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.desc: Prevents drowning and increases visibility and mining speed underwater.
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.desc: Causes a raid to start upon entering a village.
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: Gives discounts when trading and causes villagers to give gifts to the player.
text.autoconfig.potiondescriptions.title: Potion Descriptions
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.potiondes: Adds effect descriptions to potion tooltips.
effect.autumnity.extension.desc: Extends the duration of active potion effects.
effect.autumnity.foul_taste.desc: Next consumed food will replenish 50% more hunger points than normally.
effect.atmospheric.relief.desc: Heals the user if incoming damage is greater than or equal to the level.
effect.atmospheric.worsening.desc: Increases incoming damage if it is greater than or equal to the level.
effect.atmospheric.spitting.desc: Makes the user spit out seeds that deal damage.
effect.atmospheric.persistence.desc: Increases movement speed based on missing hunger.
effect.atmospheric.gelled.desc: Decreases burning damage and increases regeneration. Extinguishes fire on initial application.
effect.buzzier_bees.sunny.desc: Causes entities to behave like it's day regardless of the actual time.
effect.environmental.panic.desc: Increases movement speed based on missing health.
effect.environmental.serenity.desc: Prevents hostile mobs from spawning around the player.
effect.neapolitan.sugar_rush.desc: Gives swiftness for the first half and slowness for the second half.
effect.neapolitan.vanilla_scent.desc: Grants immunity to all potion effects.
effect.neapolitan.agility.desc: Allows entities to climb up blocks.
effect.neapolitan.berserking.desc: Increases damage and defence. Gains a level with every mob killed.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.insomnia.desc: Increases the insomnia timer, causing phantoms to spawn.
effect.upgrade_aquatic.restfulness.desc: Resets the insomnia timer like if the player just slept.
effect.abundance.succumbing.desc: Poisons the user for a short time upon taking damage.
effect.abundance.supportive.desc: Gives regeneration to animals, strength to neutral mobs and resistance to monsters around the user.
alexsmobs.potion.bug_pheromones.desc: Makes the user invisible to hostile arthropods.
alexsmobs.potion.sunbird_blessing.desc: Increases speed when flying with an elytra.
alexsmobs.potion.sunbird_curse.desc: Causes the player to fall quickly.
alexsmobs.potion.oiled.desc: Causes the user to levitate when exposed to rain.
alexsmobs.potion.clinging.desc: Allows entities to stand and walk on ceilings.
alexsmobs.potion.ender_flu.desc: Kills the affected entity and spawns enderiophages upon expiring. Can be cured with milk or chorus fruit.
alexsmobs.potion.debilitating_sting.desc: Paralyzes arthropods and deals damage to non-arthropods until half health.
effect.betterend.end_veil.description: Allows the player to stare directly into the eyes of an enderman.
effect.biomemakeover.nocturnal.descripti: Prevents phantoms from spawning on you.
effect.botania.soul_cross.desc: Restores health upon slaying any other creature.
effect.botania.emptiness.desc: Prevents mob spawning in a 128 block radius.
effect.botania.bloodthirst.desc: Allows mobs to spawn regardless of normal conditions within 64 blocks.
effect.botania.allure.desc: Doubles the speed of catching fish and fishing loot.
effect.botania.clear.desc: Clears all potion effects, both positive and negative.
effect.desolation.cinder_soul.descriptio: Grants massive damage and resistance boost, fire resistance, and a dash ability (bound to V by default).
effect.extraalchemy.photosynthesis.descr: The drinker will slowly restore hunger when standing in sunlight.
effect.extraalchemy.sails.description: Increases the speed of traveling on a boat.
effect.extraalchemy.recall.description: Teleports the drinker to the starting point upon expiring.
effect.extraalchemy.returning.descriptio: Teleports the drinker to their respawn point.
effect.extraalchemy.piper.description: Causes animals to follow the drinker.
effect.extraalchemy.learning.description: Increases XP gain by 10% and XP orb pickup radius.
effect.extraalchemy.concentration.descri: Removes potion particles in first person view.
effect.extraalchemy.combustion.descripti: Sets the target and its surroundings on fire.
effect.extraalchemy.detection.descriptio: Perceive all entities around you in a giant radius for a short time.
effect.farmersdelight.comfort.desc: Grants immunity to Slowness, Hunger and Weakness.
effect.farmersdelight.nourished.desc: Prevents the player from losing hunger or saturation.
effect.infernalexp.infection.desc: Deals damage over time and spreads to other entities.
effect.potionsmaster.coalpotioneffect.de: Highlights coal ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.ironpotioneffect.de: Highlights iron ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.redstonepotioneffec: Highlights redstone ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.lapispotioneffect.d: Highlights lapis lazuli ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.goldpotioneffect.de: Highlights gold ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.diamondpotioneffect: Highlights diamond ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.emeraldpotioneffect: Highlights emerald ore around the drinker.
Highlights copper ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.tinpotioneffect.des: Highlights tin ore around the drinker.
Highlights nickel ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.aluminiumpotioneffe: Highlights aluminium ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.vibraniumpotioneffe: Highlights vibranium ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.unobtainiumpotionef: Highlights unobtanium ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.allthemodiumpotione: Highlights allthemodium ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.uraniumpotioneffect: Highlights uranium ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.leadpotioneffect.de: Highlights lead ore around the drinker.
Highlights silver ore around the drinker.
Highlights osmium ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.zincpotioneffect.de: Highlights zinc ore around the drinker.
Highlights quartz ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.bismuthpotioneffect: Highlights bismuth ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.crimsonironpotionef: Highlights crimson iron ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.platinumpotioneffec: Highlights platinum ore around the drinker.
effect.potionsmaster.villagepotioneffect: Teleports the drinker to the nearest village.
effect.potionsmaster.shipwreckpotioneffe: Teleports the drinker to the nearest shipwreck.
effect.potionsmaster.ocean_ruinpotioneff: Teleports the drinker to the nearest ocean ruins.
effect.potionsmaster.buried_treasurepoti: Teleports the drinker to the nearest buried treasure.
effect.potionsmaster.endcitypotioneffect: Teleports the drinker to the nearest end city.
effect.potionsmaster.fortresspotioneffec: Teleports the drinker to the nearest nether fortress.
effect.potionsmaster.monumentpotioneffec: Teleports the drinker to the nearest ocean monument.
effect.potionsmaster.strongholdpotioneff: Teleports the drinker to the nearest stronghold.
effect.potionsmaster.swamp_hutpotioneffe: Teleports the drinker to the nearest witch hut.
effect.potionsmaster.jungle_pyramidpotio: Teleports the drinker to the nearest jungle temple.
effect.potionsmaster.desert_pyramidpotio: Teleports the drinker to the nearest desert pyramid.
effect.potionsmaster.igloopotioneffect.d: Teleports the drinker to the nearest igloo.
effect.potionsmaster.mansionpotioneffect: Teleports the drinker to the nearest woodland mansion.
effect.potionsmaster.mineshaftpotioneffe: Teleports the drinker to the nearest mineshaft.
effect.potionsmaster.pillager_outpostpot: Teleports the drinker to the nearest pillager outpost.
effect.quark.danger_sight.desc: Highlights spots where hostile mobs can spawn.
effect.reliquary.cure.desc: Cures zombie villagers. Higher levers work faster.
